params.conditionId: ID of the staged verifier condition
ID of the staged verifier condition

claimXPFor(address,uint256,bytes).details: Uses oracle proof bound to the provided user. Anyone can call this; oracle proof prevents abuse.

returns.thresholds: Array of XP thresholds for each level
returns.xpProgress: Current XP progress toward next level
returns.xpRequired: XP required to reach next level

returns._0: Number of unique verifiers claimed from
Array of verifier IDs the user has claimed from
Level for the given XP amount (0 if no levels configured)

returns.nextLevel: Next level number (0 if no next level)
returns.xpProgress: Current XP progress toward next level
returns.xpRequired: XP required to reach next level (0 if no next level)

returns._0: Current level (0 if no levels configured or user has no XP)
True if user has claimed from this verifier, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resetUser(address).details: Completely resets a user's XP, verifier claims, and reward thresholds

params.user: Address of the user to reset

resetVerifierProofs(uint256).details: This is a limited reset that only clears common proof patterns to avoid gas issues

params.verifierId: ID of the verifier to reset proofs for

resetVerifierProofsForUser(uint256,addre.details: This is more targeted than resetVerifierProofs and focuses on one user

params.verifierId: ID of the verifier to reset proofs for

params.conversionRate: How many ERC20 tokens per 1 XP (with decimals)

params.levels: Array of level numbers (must match thresholds length)
params.thresholds: Array of XP thresholds for each level

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.id: Identifier of the verifier to update
params.verifier: New address of the verifier contract

calculateAvailableERC20Reward(address).notice: Calculate available ERC20 rewards for a user based on their XP

claimBulkXP(uint256,bytes).notice: Bulk claim XP from a staged verifier and automatically claim ERC20 rewards

claimBulkXPFor(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Bulk claim XP on behalf of a user from a staged verifier and automatically claim ERC20 rewards

claimXP(uint256,bytes).notice: Claim XP from a verifier and automatically claim ERC20 rewards

claimXPFor(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Claim XP on behalf of a user and automatically claim ERC20 rewards

emergencyWithdrawERC20(address,uint256).notice: Emergency function to withdraw stuck ERC20 tokens

getAllLevelInfo(address).notice: Get all level information for display purposes

getAvailableERC20Reward(address).notice: Get available ERC20 rewards for a user

getClaimedVerifierCount(address).notice: Get the number of unique verifiers a user has claimed from

getClaimedVerifiers(address).notice: Get all verifier IDs that a user has claimed XP from

getLevelForXP(uint256).notice: Get level information for a specific XP amount

getNextLevelInfo(address).notice: Get next level information for a user

getTotalXP(address).notice: Get total XP for a user

getUserLevel(address).notice: Get current level for a user based on their XP

hasClaimedFromVerifier(address,uint256).notice: Check if a user has already claimed XP from a specific verifier

resetUser(address).notice: Reset all data for a user (onlyOwner)

resetVerifierProofs(uint256).notice: Reset all used proofs for a specific verifier (onlyOwner)

resetVerifierProofsForUser(uint256,addre.notice: Reset all used proofs for a specific verifier and user combination (onlyOwner)

setERC20RewardConfig(address,uint256).notice: Set ERC20 reward configuration with conversion rate
